83.heading: Jifashi.
83.title: Ming Zhen Tan Kenan vs. Hei Yi Nan Zi = Detective Conan Special Black Edition
83.author: (ri) Qingshan Gangchang zhu ; Jifashi, Daoshu, Natuya yi.
notes: Translation of: Meitantei Konan vs. Kurozukume no Otokotachi.

Summary (from OCLC): It is a secret syndicate that commits a number of crimes for various reasons which range from blackmail to robberies to assassinations. The members of the organization are given code names based on alcoholic beverages. The leader of the Black Organization is unseen and unheard of and is known only through text messages. Conan and Detective Boys are taking action.

84.heading: Jifashi.
84.title: Ming Zhen Tan Kenan : Ju Chang Ban. Tian Kong De Yu Nan Chuan
84.author: yuan zuo Qingshan Gangchang ; yi zhe Natuya, Jifashi, Tianchixiang.
notes: Translation of: Meitantei Konan : Gekijoban. Tenku no Rosuto Shippu.
Complete in 2 vols.

Summary (from OCLC): A terrorist group invades a laboratory containing a deadly bacteria and destroys the lab with an explosion. Conan Edogawa, Kogoro Mori, Ran Mori and The Detective Boys are invited by Sonoko Suzuki's uncle, Jirokichi Suzuki, to fly in his airship to witness his attempt at capturing Kaito Kid by baiting him with the jewel called Lady Sky.
